name: datanav-web
_comments: //TODO : add git pull for the build-app script

scripts.dev: cd client && npm install && npm run serve
scripts.build-app: npm run build-client && npm install && npm start
scripts.build-client: if exist "public" (rm -rf public) && mkdir public && cd client && npm run build-app
scripts.start: pm2 start index.js -n DataNav && pm2 monit
